verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessing, glory and honor, pow’r, might and dominion Be unto Thee, my blessed Lord. (repeat){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You came down from Your throne on high, You died on the cross for me. Risen from the dead You live To give me the victory.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Blessing, glory and honor, pow’r, might and dominion Be unto Thee, my blessed Lord.{/lang-eng}
